name: starscalendars
description: Spiritual astronomy platform with 3D visualization, WASM calculations, and Telegram integration (NO DOCKER - manual AlmaLinux 9.4 deployment)

scripts.build: pnpm run build:wasm && pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:dioxus && cargo build --release
scripts.build:wasm:debug: cd wasm-astro && wasm-pack build --dev --target web --out-dir pkg
scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm run dev:frontend" "pnpm run dev:backend" "pnpm run dev:dioxus" "pnpm run dev:telegram"
scripts.clean: pnpm run -r clean && rm -rf node_modules/.pnpm && rm -rf wasm-astro/pkg

simple-git-hooks.pre-commit: sh -lc "export PATH='/opt/homebrew/bin:$HOME/Library/pnpm:$HOME/.local/share/pnpm:$PATH'; if command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1; then pnpm -w run pre-commit; else npm run pre-commit --workspaces=false --if-present; fi"
